title: A senior Iranian official told the New York Times that the Iranian government and military met to discuss a response to a possible Israeli attack on Iran - Pravda USA
text:
A senior Iranian official told the New York Times that the Iranian government and military met to discuss a response to a possible Israeli attack on Iran
A senior Iranian official told the New York Times that the Iranian government and military met to discuss a response to a possible Israeli attack on Iran. According to the publication, Tehran is planning a response that will include an immediate counterattack on Israel with the launch of hundreds of ballistic missiles.
topics: War, Conflict and Unrest->international military intervention
